intro: Crossopetalum cristalense, commonly known as the crystalline crosspetalum, is a rare and unique plant native to the Andean regions of South America. The plant belongs to the Bromeliaceae family, which includes many epiphytic and terrestrial species. Its flowers are small and clustered, often displaying vibrant colors that attract pollinators.
